scopeContent.description:
'An oil painting entitled "England's pride & glory". The picture represents a young lady & a boy in a picture gallery. The young lady stands with her hand on the boy's shoulder & is talking to him about the great deeds of Lord nelson whose portrait hangs immediately in front of them, & at which the boy is looking. On the left hangs a picture representing the Battle of the Nile'.

There is no copy of the artwork/photograph attached to this entry form.
